config: Additional Snippets. We have improved the accessibility and clarity of the Immigration Legal Guide by writing more snippets to highlight key points in this area.
Additional Case Law Outlines. We have continued writing case outlines for law school elective courses, such as Entertainment Law, Sports Law, and Family Law.

Onward Blog Posts Highlighting Legal Guides. We wrote a couple of posts on our Justia Onward blog explaining how consumers could use our Birth Injuries Center and our business incorporation guides, such as this California guide.
Review of Case Law Resources. We have started identifying areas for improvement in the case law section of the portal and developing strategies to address them.

Justia Mexico Legal Portal. The resources available on our Justia Mexico Legal Portal, such as laws and legal content, have been referenced as a source of information and mentioned in initiatives in the Mexican Congress, journalistic papers, and magazines such as Business Insider. Our content has also appeared in other media such as W Radio, Milenio, Radio Formula, Expansion, and El Comercio, to name a few.
